resources.string: Here is an app which can help you to practice your Android and Kotlin skills. It\'s first version, where only tests with one version available.\n \nIn the future, multi-optional tests and graphic connection tests will be added.
You can go back to the title screen by pressing the button below or tapping on the back button. On the title screen you can start testing your skills.

Welcome to the Android Quiz App. Here you can test your knowledge of Android and Kotlin. The amount of questions is dynamic, but at least 5. Passing this test, you can be sure that you know basics of Android Developement.
Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.
If you get the 80\u0025 of the answers wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
Nice run! You scored %1$s points! It\'s %2$s of possible result!
It\'s not perfect, but you can improve your results. Just keep studying and you will become better and better!

You've lost! You've chosen less than 80% of correct answers.
